page.title: 11HOUSING IN UPMINSTER
page.content:
The age os most houses is 1930-1940. In Upminster most of the houses are semi-detached with three bedrooms. The price range is 50,000 to 100,000 pounds. The most expensive road in Upminster is Little Gaynes Lane. The gardens are about 35-70 metres long. Because Upminster is beginning to become a bigger town and they want to build more houses, the gardens will get smaller. More people want to move in than move out. The most popular houses in Upmnster are Tudor with a garage.
by pupils from BRANFIL SCHOOL
